aboutMeText: Hi, I am a Front-end developer based in Hof/Saale, Germany.
bulb: I like to create dynamic and responsive websites. My focus is on crafting seamless user experiences and writing clean, efficient code.
puzzle: Through the Developer Akademie, I have honed my skills in various aspects of front-end development. With a strong foundation and confidence in my software development abilities, I am eager to take on my next professional challenge!
contactText: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
descriptionPortfolio: Down below you can find projects I have developed.
skillsText: I have gained experience in building projects with various technologies and concepts.
contactFormPrivacyError: You must agree to the privacy policy.
contactFormPrivacyText3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

projects.title: Sharkie
projects.description: Swim, slap and bubble shooting game based on the object-oriented approach. Help Sharkie to collect coins and bottles to fight the dangerous Shark.

projects.title: Join - Kanban Board
projects.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: My own Portfolio page you are currently on.

projects.title: Pokedex
projects.description: A library based on the PokeAPI.
